sections.heading: Application of law of stateExcept as otherwise provided by this Chapter, a responding tribunal of this state shall:(1) Apply the procedural and substantive law generally applicable to similar proceedings originating in this state and may exercise all powers and provide all remedies available in thos
sections.text: Application of law of stateExcept as otherwise provided by this Chapter, a responding tribunal of this state shall:(1) Apply the procedural and substantive law generally applicable to similar proceedings originating in this state and may exercise all powers and provide all remedies available in those proceedings; and(2) Determine the duty of support and the amounts payable in accordance with the law and support guidelines of this state.Acts 1995, No. 251, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 1996; Acts 1997, No. 1241, ยง1, eff. July 15, 1997; Acts 2015, No. 80, ยง1, eff. July 1, 2015.
